alert.note: Alert for Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 4:01AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph across the higher elevations. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. In New York, Eastern Albany and Western Rensselaer Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow and ice covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates may be close to one inch per hour at times overnight. Some sleet and freezing rain may mix in at times tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
